DOC.brief_title: The Effect Phentermine B12 Weight Loss Among Obese Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot study double blind , randomize control trial design determine significance combination therapy phentermine B12 injection among obese population . The study population recruit ECU Physicians Internal Medicine clinic . Physicians select patient meet inclusion exclusion criterion clinic approach recruitment . Approximately 30 patient recruit blindly randomize either treatment group ( phentermine B12 combination ) control group ( phentermine alone ) . Patients randomized mean block randomization 1:1 ratio . Neither patient study team member aware group assignment entire duration study . Once randomize , group begin take 37.5 mg/day orally phentermine well receive weekly intramuscular injection either 1000 mg B12 Saline depend group assignment . The study consist approximately 15 visit course 3 month .
